caption: Yummy pizza, tastes so good! Fresh, tasty, and home made! Perfect spot to grab an Italian bite! Pizza, cheese breads, canoli’s, snd more! Also, come for the good vibes !!

I just moved to Miami from Florida and have been looking for a good pizza spot for months this place is the closest I’ve found to New York style pizza! It’s located inside the syndicate wynwood bar and you can tell the pizza is made fresh. Super good and affordable. Definitely recommend!
